sect4.title: less
sect4.para: The less program is a file pager (or text viewer). It displays the contents of a file and has the ability to scroll. Less is an improvement on the common pager called more. Less has the ability to scroll backwards through files as well and it doesn't need to read the entire file when it starts, which makes it faster when reading large files.

sect4.title: lessecho
sect4.para: lessecho is needed to expand metacharacters, such as * and ?, in filenames on Unix systems.

sect4.title: lesskey
sect4.para: lesskey is used to specify key bindings for less.
